text: Attila Ladinszky nicknamed Le Gitan (The Gypsy) (13 September 1949 - 14 May 2020) was a Hungarian football striker. He was born in Budapest. From 1968 to 1970, he made 59 appearances for FC Tatab√°nya. From 1973 to 1975, he appeared 52 times for R.S.C. Anderlecht. From 1975 to 1978, he made 59 appearances for Real Betis. He retired in 1983. Afterwards, he became a businessman owning many restaurants in Budapest. Ladinszky died in Budapest, Hungary on 14 May 2020 from heart disease, aged 70.Oud-Feyenoord-spits Ladinsky (70) overleden ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from heart disease Category:Footballers from Budapest Category:Businesspeople from Budapest
title: Attila Ladinszky
